properties.title: Textual IRC Client Extras
properties.certificate: 3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: BestTechie Holdings, Inc.

choice.title: Scripts
choice.description: This package installs all custom scripts that are exempt from the sandbox. What's included: apps, music, np, page, qt, spotify, rdio, vlc, and yolo.

choice.title: Extensions
choice.description: This package installs extensions that may be found useful to a select group of users.

choice.title: iTunes Controller
choice.description: This extension, created by Tobias Pollmann, adds the "/itunes" command to Textual providing a command-based interface for playing, pausing, going to next song (or previous), and more. It also adds a preference pane which can be used to configure the output of now playing information associated with the newly added command. â€” See "/itunes help" for a list of available commands.

choice.title: Smiley Converter
choice.description: This extension can be used to automatically convert text based smilies to emoji icons. For example, the smiley ":-)" becomes "ðŸ˜Š" or "^_^" becomes "ðŸ˜„"

choice.title: Wikipedia Link Parser
choice.description: Wiki-style link parser to automatically replace [[<title>]] text blocks with the actual link.

requirement.message: The ability for addons to be executed outside of the Mac OS sandbox was not introduced until Mountain Lion. Installing these addons on an earlier version of Mac OS will result in them doing absolutely nothing.
